name: KODAKFrameSkill
0:
”Alexa, turn on [xxx's frame]”
”Alexa, turn off [xxx's frame]”
”Alexa, volume up [xxx's frame ]”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des: Control devices for IoT smart homes using voice commands. The frame device is integrated with Amazon's IoT protocol, allowing you to issue voice commands through the Alexa app. When the command reaches the server, it is then pushed to the frame device, which receives and executes the voice command.
